select
from biz_format where is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY biz_format_id DESC
SELECT biz_format_id FROM biz_format WHERE biz_format_number = #{bizFormatNumber} AND is_deleted = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_format SET is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE NOT exists( SELECT biz_format_id FROM biz_shop WHERE biz_shop.biz_format_id = biz_format.biz_format_id) AND NOT exists( SELECT type FROM biz_building WHERE biz_building.type = biz_format.biz_format_id) AND biz_format_id = #{bizFormatId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
